plot: A murderer's crime is videotaped by his neighbor. When the incriminating tape ends up at a video store, the murderer is forced to rent and watch every video in the store until he locates the tape in question.
title: Nomu mani pon sanai
plot_es: A murderer's crime is videotaped by his neighbor. When the incriminating tape ends up at a video store, the murderer is forced to rent and watch every video in the store until he locates the tape in question.
plot_en: A murderer's crime is videotaped by his neighbor. When the incriminating tape ends up at a video store, the murderer is forced to rent and watch every video in the store until he locates the tape in question.
